alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, northeastern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 932 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Leon, or near Kemah, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Pasadena, League City, Texas City, Friendswood, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Seabrook, Webster, Hitchcock, Kemah, Clear Lake, southern South Belt / Ellington, Nassau Bay, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Clear Lake Shores, San Leon, The Johnson Space Center and Bacliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
